title: Verify BW Policy is applied with SSL Decryption Policy ( create multiple combinations )
custom_expected:
Create SSL Decryption Policy 1 with Match Crieteria -> App as Egnyte
Create SSL Decryption Policy 2 with Match Crieteria -> App as Box
Create BW Policy to apply QoS on Egnyte application
Check with multiple match criteria and apply BW Policy. Check Policy Lookup for BW Policy in AND/OR scenarios  

- SSL Decryption Policy should be applied for Egnyte. Along with this, BW Policy should be applied.
- SSL Decryption Policy should be applied for Box but, BW Policy should not be applied.
